Mayor and City Council
======================

Physical Address:

719 Scott Avenue  
3rd Floor  
Wichita Falls, TX 76307

Phone:

[940-761-7404](tel:9407617404)

Fax:

940-761-8833

Link: [Mayor & City Council Information](http://www.wichitafallstx.gov/29/Mayor-and-City-Council)  
  

Please follow the links for the individual e-mail contacts
